publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1496 Rob Gibson: Support for the Minn Family-That the Parliament supports the aims of Shetland Against Deportation, which is campaigning to ensure that the Burmese family of Hazel Minn and her two children are not deported by order of the Home Office from her home in Shetland to where she would be in severe danger and in opposition to the wishes of around 6,000 Shetlanders who have signed a petition in support of the Minn family.

S2M-1496 Rob Gibson: Support for the Minn Family-That the Parliament supports the aims of Shetland Against Deportation, which is campaigning to ensure that the Burmese family of Hazel Minn and her two children are not deported by order of the Home Office from her home in Shetland to where she would be in severe danger and in opposition to the wishes of around 6,000 Shetlanders who have signed a petition in support of the Minn family.
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rosie Kane*, Shiona Baird*, Mike Pringle*, Elaine Smith*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Jim Mather*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Chris Ballance*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Bruce Crawford*, John Swinburne*, Margaret Smith*
S2M-1496 Support for the Minn Family (lodged on 17 June 2004) Dennis Canavan*
